name: dragon-breath
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Strikes the foe with an
incredible blast of breath.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Strikes the foe with an
incredible blast of breath.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is hit with
an incredible blast
of breath that may
also paralyze.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user exhales
a mighty gust that
inflicts damage.
It may also paralyze
the target.

a mighty gust that

the target.
